name: TVColorType
desc: Designates how color for an element is to be displayed.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Indicates that there is no color associated with an element.

items.name: case plain
items.desc: Indicates that a single color is to be used with an element.

items.name: case linearGradientTopToBottom
items.desc: Indicates that a color gradient goes from the top to the bottom of an element.

items.name: case linearGradientLeftToRight
items.desc: Indicates that a color gradient goes from the left to the right of an element.
